name: PortableCompressedGasOxygenTherapyDevice
title: Portable Compressed Gas Oxygen Therapy Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Oxygen concentrator therapy devices for home use home that are designed to allow a change in location while operating.),(Data Element Scope: Portable oxygen concentrator therapy devices accepted by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid as valid for home use.),(Inclusion Criteria: Oxygen concentrator therapy devices for home use home that are designed to allow a change in location while operating.),(Exclusion Criteria: Oxygen concentrator therapy devices designed to remain in one place while operating.)
